description: This file defines an interface for Rust integration within the WPEFramework. It declares the IRustBridge interface with methods for configuration, request handling, and event management, as well as an ICallback interface for Rust-to-Thunder notifications.

classes.name: IRustBridge
classes.description: Interface for bridging communication between Rust and Thunder components, supporting configuration, request/response, and event methods.

classes.name: IRustBridge::ICallback
classes.description: Callback interface for Rust to send notifications, events, and responses to Thunder.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Sets up the Rust bridge with the framework shell and callback.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Rust calls to invoke a method on Thunder side, identified by an ID.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Rust calls to send an event to Thunder subscribers.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Callback method for Thunder to invoke Rust with a request.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Callback method for Rust to notify Thunder of an event.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Callback method for Rust to respond to Thunder requests.

ctags.name: ICallback
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL ICallback : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IRustBridge
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IRustBridge : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
